debug-properties-plus.screen.title: Debug Properties
debug-properties-plus.screen.warning: Debug properties exist for debugging purposes only. They might corrupt your world! Only change if you know what you are doing.
debug-properties-plus.screen.header.serv: Global debug properties affecting the server:
debug-properties-plus.screen.header.glob: Global debug properties affecting the client:
debug-properties-plus.screen.disabled.la: Can only be set by LAN-host.
debug-properties-plus.screen.disabled.re: Requires OP to set on server.
debug-properties-plus.screen.disabled.no: Requires debug-properties-plus to be installed on the server.
debug-properties-plus.command.get: Debug property %s is currently set to: %s
debug-properties-plus.command.set: Debug property %s is now set to: %s
